attributes.action: A safer walk to reffley community school
attributes.additional_details:
A collective group of Reffley parents have come together as we believe that there is a need for revised safety measures around Reffley Community School, to minimise the risk of serious injury and potential death of a child, or young person or member of the community.

This petition is to request that Norfolk County Council reassess and evaluate the effectiveness of the current road markings, traffic restrictions and road layout along Reffley Lane in the vicinity of Reffley Community School.

rejection.details: This is a matter, as the petition acknowledges, for Norfolk County Council.
